data.title: Ritter von Pisarski Verwandtschaft Czartoryski, Radziwill, Butschal
data.meta_description: Biographical genealogy of the descendants of Pisarski, of Pisarsky, Ritter von Pisarski,  Edle von Pisarsky, Hermelin Pisarski,
data.text:
Die Nachkommen von

Jurij Czartoryski, Starost of Luck

(12 generations)

Jurij Czartoryski (Chartoriyski) *

Starost of Luck

Born circa 1550

Died 1626 or 1632

Married (1) circa 1580 Div.ca 1605

Princess Alexandra Wisniowiecka, daughter of Andreas,

Prince Wisniowiecki and Euphemia Wierzbicka

Died 1612

Married (2) Halszka Holowinska

Married (3) Princess Zofia Lubomirska, daughter of Andreas

Bogumil, Prince Lubomirski and Princess Anna Radziwill

Children, Generation I

Generation I

(1) 1 Prince Aleksander Czartoryski

Died before 1605

2 Prince Adrian Czartoryski

Died after 1618

3 Prince Mikolaj Jerzy Czartoryski

Woiwode of Podolien & Wolhynien

Died 1662

Married January 1617

Princess Izabella Korecka, daughter of Prince Joachim

Korecki and Anna Chodkiewicz

Died 16 March 1669

Children, Generation II-1

(2) 4 Prince Andrzej Czartoryski

5 Princess Zofia Czartoryska

Died circa 1649 /1650

Married 1646

Kazimierz Piaseczynski

Died 25 November 1659

6 Princess Halszka Czartoryska

Married Stanislaw Firlej

II-1 (I-3)

1 Florian Kazimierz Czartoryski

Archbishop of Gnesen

Born before 1620 Klewan

Died 15 May 1674 Warszawa

Prince Czartoryski, Duke of Klewan & Zukow

Born 1621

Died 13 April 1692 Podhorce

Married (1) 16 June 1646 Thorn

Rosine Margarethe von Eckenberg, daughter of NN von

Eckenberg and Margarethe von Toll

Died 13 October 1648 (Aldenstein?)

Married (2) 2 February 1650 Warszawa

Euphrosine Stanislawska, daughter of Johann Andreas

Stanislawski and Zofia Kozlowska

Born 18 April 1629

Died 2 January 1668 Warszawa

Married (3) 15 December 1668 Zakroczym

Johanna Veronika Oledzka, daughter of Tomas Oledzki and

Anna Grzybowska

Died 1 August 1729

Children, Generation III-1

3 Johann Karl

Prince Czartoryski

Born 1626

Died 1680

Married (1) before 1663

Anna Zebrydowska, daughter of Nikolaus Zebrydowski and

Marie Stadnicka

Died 3 March 1668 Wolczyn

Married (2) 21 May 1668 Warszawa

Magdalena Konopacka, daughter of Jakob Konopacki and

Elisabeth Dulska

Died 1694

Children, Generation III-2

III-1 (II-1-2)

Prince Czartoryski, Duke of Klewan and Zukow

Died 31 August 1741 Warszawa

Married 1693

Countess Isabella Morsztyn, daughter of Count Jan Andrzej

Morsztyn and Lady Catherine Gordon

Born 26 August 1671

Died 24 February 1758 Warszawa

Children, Generation IV-1

III-2 (II-1-3)

Prince Czartoryski

Died 1 August 1750

Married 29 July Podkamien

Countess Theresie Donhoff, daughter of Count Wladislaw

Donhoff and Constantia Szluszka

Children, Generation IV-2

IV-1 (III-1-1)

1 Michael

Prince Czartoryski

Born 26 April 1696 Warszawa

Died 13 August 1775 Warszawa

Married 30 October 1726 Prag

Countess Eleonora Monica von Waldstein, daughter of Count

Johann Anton von Waldstein and Countess Anna von Waldstein

Born 12 April 1710 Prag

Died after 1795

Children, Generation V-1

Prince Czartoryski

Countess Zofia Sieniawska, daughter of Count Adam Nikolaj

Born 1700

Died 27 October 1759

Married 14 September 1720

Stanislaus Poniatowski

Prince Czartoryski, Bishop of Posen

Prince Czartoryski

Johanna Potocka

Died August 1778 Kalwaria nr Troki

Michael, Prince Wisniowiecki

Born 1680

Died 16 September 1744

1 Princess Antoinette Czartoryska

Born 1728

Died 1798

Died 1800

Prince Czartoryski

Died 17 June 1835 Wysock

Born 21 May 1736

Died 25 November 1816 Wien

Died 12 August 1783 Castle Lancut

Count Michael Oginski

Prince Czartoryski, Starost of Luck

Antoni Barnaba Jablonowski, Voivoide of Poznan, Kastellan

Prince Czartoryski

Married (1) 1763 Warszawa

Zamoyski, 7.Ordinat of Zamosc and Therese Aniela Michowska

Died 15 May 1767 Zamosc

Married (2) 1768 Warszawa

Zamoyski, 6.Ordinat of Zamosc, Woiwoide of Smolensk and

Anne Dzialynska

Born 1716

Died 10 February 1792 Zamosc

Duke von Wuerttemberg 1795-1797 and Markgraefin Sophie

Dorothea von Brandenburg-Schwedt

Died 20 September 1817 Kirchheim unter Teck

Prince Czartoryski, Duke of Klewan and Zukow

Died 15 July 1861 Montfermeil nr Paris

Married 25 September 1817 Radzyn

Prince Sapieha-Kodenski and Countess Anna Zamoyska

Born 1798

Died 24 December 1864 Montpellier

Children, Generation VII-1

3 Konstantin

Prince Czartoryski

Born 28 October 1773 Warszawa

Died 23 April 1860 Wien

Married (1) 20 July 1802 Nieborow

Princess Angelica Radziwill, daughter of Michal Hieronim,

Prince Radziwill, Palatin of Wilno and Helena Przezdziecka

Died 16 September 1808 Wien

Married (2) 20 March 1810 Wien

Maria Dzierzanowska, daughter of Johann Dzierzanowski and

NN Dubisz

Died 28 November 1842 Wien

Zamoyski and Princess Konstantia Czartoryska

Born 13 January 1775 Warszawa

Died 2 April 1856 Wien

Countess Christine Potocka

Henryk, Prince Lubomirski, son of Joseph, Prince Lubomirski

and Louise Sosnowska

Johann Potocki and Princess Julia Lubomirska

Stanislaus Rzyszczewski

Died 1857 Zukowce

Prince Czartoryski

Grocholski and Ksawera Brzozowska

Born 29 November 1833

Died 9 May 1928 Cracow

S.P.

2 Wladyslaw

Prince Czartoryski

Born 3 July 1828 Warszawa

Married (1) 1 March 1855 Malmaison

Do¤a Maria de los Desamparados Munoz y Borbon, Condesa de

Vista Alegre, daughter of Don Agustin Fernando Munoz y

Sanchez, Duque de Riansares and Princess Maria Cristina of

The Two Sicilies, Queen-Regent of Spain

Born 17 November 1834 Madrid

Died 19 August 1864 Paris

Married (2) 15 January 1872 Chateau de Chantilly

Princesse Marguerite d'Orleans, daughter of Louis Charles,

Duc de Nemours and Princess Victoria of Saxe-Coburg and

Gotha, Duchess of Saxony

Died 24 October 1893 Paris

Died 30 March 1880 Kornik

Prince Czartoryski

Luise of Prussia

Countess Elzbieta Dzialynska, daughter of Count Titus

Dzialynski and Countess Celestine Zamoyska

Prince Czartoryski

Prince Czartoryski

Prince Czartoryski

Vessely

Prince Czartoryski, Duque de Vista Alegre

(2) 2 Adam Ludwik

Prince Czartoryski, Duke of Klewan and Zukow

3 Witold

Prince Czartoryski
